channel.title: 1982 on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in 1982 on Sermon Archives

item.title: No Counterfeit Hope
item.description: Here is a typed sermon from April of 1982. The original church season is listed as “9th,10th Comm.” which may have been first communion for 9th and 10th graders. On reading the sermon, it’s more likely a reference to the 9th and 10th Commandments, though.

item.title: The Incredible Sacrifice
item.description: This is a typed Lenten sermon from April of 1982. The typed sermon includes some whiteout and annotations with blue pen.

item.title: R.S.V.P.
item.description: This is an All Saints Day sermon from 1982. There is a reference to the French meaning of RSVP, but it’s apparent that he’s not a French scholar.
